title: Unravelling the Bayeux Tapestry ep5: What now?
itunes:title: Unravelling the Bayeux Tapestry ep5: What now?
itunes:subtitle: In the final episode of the series, our panel considers the afterlife of the Tapestry, debating its differing legacies in France and Britain, whether it might be exhibited in Britain, and why it continues to fascinate.
description:
In the final episode of the series, our panel considers the afterlife of the Tapestry, debating its differing legacies in France and Britain, whether it might be exhibited in Britain, and why it continues to fascinate. Dr David Musgrove and Professor Michael Lewis are joined in the discussion by Professor Michael Wood and Dr Janina Ramirez.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
